abstract: Russia raised $3.3 billion selling a stake in VTB Group, the first of several privatizations the country said it would undertake in the next three years.
snippet: Russia raised $3.3 billion selling a stake in VTB Group, the first of several privatizations the country said it would undertake in the next three years.
lead_paragraph: Russia raised $3.3 billion selling a minority stake in the state-owned bank VTB Group, the lender said on Monday in a London Stock Exchange filing.

headline.main: Russia Sells Stake in State-Owned Lender VTB
